name: For All Cookies
description:
An AI hijacks your PC, takes control of your mouse and tries to steal all your cookies! 

Use your epic hacking skills to defeat the evil AI!

Controls: Use the mouse and click to shoot. The game takes control of your cursor, but you can press ESC to escape the game any time.

Note: I was planning on doing more with the final boss, but ran out of time :(

Music by Abstraction, from the Three Red Hearts (Prepare To Dev) bundle.

http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
